languages.text: {n}Мгновение вам кажется, что свет покинул глаза Маражая — но только мгновение: взгляд ксеноса заливает опаляющая ненависть. Он с утробным рыком вскидывает клинки... заносит руку для удара... а потом, словно осознав, что остаться на корабле мон-кай без свое{mf|го|й} покровител{mf|я|ьницы} равнозначно смерти, отступает. Сжав челюсти, нелюдь бросает на вас последний взгляд — и, отвернувшись, бросается прочь, ни разу не оглядываясь.{/n}

{n}For a moment, you think the light has gone out of Marazhai's eyes, but only for a moment — the xenos's gaze is flooded with scorching hatred. He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мгновение вам кажется, что свет покинул глаза Маражая — но только мгновение: взгляд ксеноса заливает опаляющая ненависть. Он с утробным рыком вскидывает клинки... заносит руку для удара... а потом, словно осознав, что остаться на корабле мон-кай без свое{mf|го|й} покровител{mf|я|ьницы} равнозначно смерти, отступает. Сжав челюсти, нелюдь бросает на вас последний взгляд — и, отвернувшись, бросается прочь, ни разу не оглядываясь.{/n}

He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你看到玛拉斋眼中的光芒熄灭了，但也仅仅只是一瞬间。下一刻，他的目光中迸射出了炽烈的仇恨。他发出一声低沉的咆哮，举起手中的武器……然后，他仿佛像是突然意识到，如果失去了你的庇护，他在这艘满是猴子的飞船上恐怕会立刻毙命，于是又黯然垂下了手臂。玛拉斋咬紧牙关，最后看了你一眼，随后转身快步离去，再也没有回头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, you think the light has gone out of Marazhai's eyes, but only for a moment — the xenos's gaze is flooded with scorching hatred. He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你看到玛拉斋眼中的光芒熄灭了，但也仅仅只是一瞬间。下一刻，他的目光中迸射出了炽烈的仇恨。他发出一声低沉的咆哮，举起手中的武器……然后，他仿佛像是突然意识到，如果失去了你的庇护，他在这艘满是猴子的飞船上恐怕会立刻毙命，于是又黯然垂下了手臂。玛拉斋咬紧牙关，最后看了你一眼，随后转身快步离去，再也没有回头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durante un segundo te parece que el brillo de los ojos de Marazhai se ha apagado, pero el momento dura poco; enseguida la mirada del xenos proyecta un odio abrasador. Blande sus espadas con un gruñido gutural... levanta el brazo para asestar un golpe... y entonces, como si cayese en la cuenta de que quedarse en la nave de los mon-keigh sin su capitán sería el equivalente a una pena de muerte, ceja en su empeño. Apretando los dientes, el xenos te lanza una última mirada y luego se da la vuelta y huye apresuradamente sin volver la vista atrás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, you think the light has gone out of Marazhai's eyes, but only for a moment — the xenos's gaze is flooded with scorching hatred. He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durante un segundo te parece que el brillo de los ojos de Marazhai se ha apagado, pero el momento dura poco; enseguida la mirada del xenos proyecta un odio abrasador. Blande sus espadas con un gruñido gutural... levanta el brazo para asestar un golpe... y entonces, como si cayese en la cuenta de que quedarse en la nave de los mon-keigh sin su capitán sería el equivalente a una pena de muerte, ceja en su empeño. Apretando los dientes, el xenos te lanza una última mirada y luego se da la vuelta y huye apresuradamente sin volver la vista atrás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, vous pensez que l'éclat s'est éteint dans le regard de Marazhai, mais vous réalisez bien vite votre erreur. Dans les yeux du xénos, vous lisez désormais une colère inextinguible. Dans un rugissement guttural, il brandit ses lames pour vous frapper... et s'interrompt en réalisant qu'éliminer son unique {mf|protecteur|protectrice} à bord de ce vaisseau mon-keigh signerait à coup sûr son propre arrêt de mort. Il serre les dents et vous lance un ultime coup d'œil avant de s'éloigner à grands pas sans un regard en arrière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, you think the light has gone out of Marazhai's eyes, but only for a moment — the xenos's gaze is flooded with scorching hatred. He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'espace d'un instant, vous pensez que l'éclat s'est éteint dans le regard de Marazhai, mais vous réalisez bien vite votre erreur. Dans les yeux du xénos, vous lisez désormais une colère inextinguible. Dans un rugissement guttural, il brandit ses lames pour vous frapper... et s'interrompt en réalisant qu'éliminer son unique {mf|protecteur|protectrice} à bord de ce vaisseau mon-keigh signerait à coup sûr son propre arrêt de mort. Il serre les dents et vous lance un ultime coup d'œil avant de s'éloigner à grands pas sans un regard en arrière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einen Moment lang glaubst du, das Licht in Marazhais Augen wäre erloschen, aber nur ganz kurz – der Blick des Xenos zeigt brennenden Hass. Er fuchtelt mit seinen Klingen herum und knurrt dabei kehlig ... dann hebt er seinen Arm, um zuzuschlagen ... auf einmal, als würde ihm klar werden, dass es seinem Tod gleichkommt, ohne {mf|seinen Gönner|seine Gönnerin} auf dem Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff zu bleiben, gibt er nach. Mit verkrampften Kiefermuskeln sieht dich der Xenos ein letztes Mal an, dreht sich dann um und rauscht davon, ohne sich noch mal umzusehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, you think the light has gone out of Marazhai's eyes, but only for a moment — the xenos's gaze is flooded with scorching hatred. He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einen Moment lang glaubst du, das Licht in Marazhais Augen wäre erloschen, aber nur ganz kurz – der Blick des Xenos zeigt brennenden Hass. Er fuchtelt mit seinen Klingen herum und knurrt dabei kehlig ... dann hebt er seinen Arm, um zuzuschlagen ... auf einmal, als würde ihm klar werden, dass es seinem Tod gleichkommt, ohne {mf|seinen Gönner|seine Gönnerin} auf dem Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff zu bleiben, gibt er nach. Mit verkrampften Kiefermuskeln sieht dich der Xenos ein letztes Mal an, dreht sich dann um und rauscht davon, ohne sich noch mal umzusehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一瞬、マラズハイの目から光が消えたかと思われたが、それはほんの束の間のことだった。異種族の目は、燃え盛る憎しみに溢れていた。彼は小声で唸りを上げ、刃を振りかざす。殴りかかろうと腕を振り上げ…そして、まるで自分の後援者を失ってまでモン＝ケイの船に残ることは死に等しいと悟ったかのように、手を緩めた。顎を引いた異種族は、最後の一瞥を投げかけると踵を返し、振り返ることなく駆け去っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, you think the light has gone out of Marazhai's eyes, but only for a moment — the xenos's gaze is flooded with scorching hatred. He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、マラズハイの目から光が消えたかと思われたが、それはほんの束の間のことだった。異種族の目は、燃え盛る憎しみに溢れていた。彼は小声で唸りを上げ、刃を振りかざす。殴りかかろうと腕を振り上げ…そして、まるで自分の後援者を失ってまでモン＝ケイの船に残ることは死に等しいと悟ったかのように、手を緩めた。顎を引いた異種族は、最後の一瞥を投げかけると踵を返し、振り返ることなく駆け去っていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir anlığına, yalnızca o anlığına Marazhai'ın gözlerindeki ışığın söndüğünü düşünüyorsun ama... Zenonun bakışları, kavurucu bir öfkeyle dolup taşıyor. Gırtlaktan gelen bir hırıltıyla bıçaklarını savuruyor... Saldırmak için kolunu kaldırıyor ve... Ardından sahibinin olmadığı bir mon-keigh gemisinde bulunmanın ölüme eş değer olduğunu fark etmişçesine pes ediyor. Çenesini kenetleyen zeno, sana son bir bakış atıyor ve dönüp arkasına bile bakmadan hızlı adımlarla uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, you think the light has gone out of Marazhai's eyes, but only for a moment — the xenos's gaze is flooded with scorching hatred. He brandishes his blades with a guttural snarl... raising his arm to strike... and then, as if realising that to remain on the mon-keigh ship without his patron would be tantamount to death, relents. Clenching his jaw, the xenos casts one last glance at you, and then turns and rushes away, never looking back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir anlığına, yalnızca o anlığına Marazhai'ın gözlerindeki ışığın söndüğünü düşünüyorsun ama... Zenonun bakışları, kavurucu bir öfkeyle dolup taşıyor. Gırtlaktan gelen bir hırıltıyla bıçaklarını savuruyor... Saldırmak için kolunu kaldırıyor ve... Ardından sahibinin olmadığı bir mon-keigh gemisinde bulunmanın ölüme eş değer olduğunu fark etmişçesine pes ediyor. Çenesini kenetleyen zeno, sana son bir bakış atıyor. Ardından dönüp arkasına bile bakmadan hızlı adımlarla uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
